songs.title: Emona durmati saṁsāra bhitare
songs.author: Bhaktivinoda Ṭhākura
songs.lyrics:
Emona durmati saṁsāra bhitare, pāinu āmi viṣaya-sukhete
Bhūli' tomāre, karaṇa āmāra, pāinu duḥkhera prabāhe
Tomā vinā ke āche āmāra, dayāla Nanda-tanaya?
Kṛpā kari' more, nistāra more, loho nija-pada-chāyā

songs.title: Śrī Rūpa Mañjarī Pada
songs.author: Narottama Dāsa Ṭhākura
songs.lyrics:
Śrī Rūpa Mañjarī pada, sei mora sampada
sei mora bhajana-pūjana
sei mora prāṇa-dhana, sei mora ābharaṇa
sei mora jīvana-jīvana

songs.title: Bhaja Bhakata Vatsala Śrī Gaurahari
songs.author: Bhaktivinoda Ṭhākura
songs.lyrics:
Bhaja bhakata vatsala śrī-gaurahari
śrī-gaurahari, gaurahari
Bhaja bhakata vatsala śrī-gaurahari
Hare Kṛṣṇa Hare Kṛṣṇa Kṛṣṇa Kṛṣṇa Hare Hare
Hare Rāma Hare Rāma Rāma Rāma Hare Hare
